name: Smash Glass Pyramid
description:
Smash every glass pyramid in your path with your finger tap in Smash Glass Pyramid. This game requires your focus, concentration, and timing to not only go as far as you can, but also smash the beautiful glass pyramids that stand in your way.

Game Features:
- Realistic glass pyramid destruction physics
- Awesome game play
- Play with amusing background music
- 10 best interesting levels
- First Person perspective game

How to Play:
Tap on the screen to destroy the glass pyramids. Stay focused and concentrate on the path destroy every pyramid and obstacle coming in the path. Show your reflexes and hit the pyramids and obstacles in time to go as far as you can. Try to avoid obstacles by hitting then in time, if you hit the obstacle it will slow you down. So stay focus to go as far as you can to complete the level...

Share with your friends & family and compete your HighScore with them...
